    • Method Detail

      • initEngine

        public static boolean initEngine(javax.script.ScriptEngine jse)
        Initialize a JavaScript Engine to be suitable for ScriptingLab.

        Parameters:
        jse - - JavaScript Engine
        Returns:
        - true if load OK, false if fail

      • loadClass

        public static boolean loadClass(javax.script.ScriptEngine jse,
                java.lang.String module_name,
                java.lang.String jar_url,
                java.lang.String class_path)
        Load new module to JavaScript engine, a module in JS is respective to a class in Java.

        This function, originally should be used by script file.

        Example: load(jse, "foo", "d:\LibFoo.jar", "org.foo.Foo");

        Parameters:
        jse - - JS engine loaded to
        module_name - - object name in JS engine
        jar_url - - path to jar file
        class_path - - path to class inside jar file
        Returns:
        - true if load OK, false if fail

      • loadJar

        public static boolean loadJar(java.lang.String jar_url)
        add jar library to JVM class path, from then packages can be imported .

        Parameters:
        jar_url - - path to jar file
        Returns:
        - true if load OK, false if fail
